shopping.name: Zhongyang Street (中央大街)
shopping.notes_local: 俄式风情历史街道。可购买：俄罗斯纪念品（套娃、琥珀饰品）、冬季装备（皮帽、围巾）、当地小吃（哈尔滨红肠）。多数商铺营业时间9:00-21:00。小店可砍价，品牌店不可。
shopping.notes_base: Historic Russian-style street. Shop for: Russian souvenirs (Matryoshka dolls, amber jewelry), winter gear (fur hats, scarves), local snacks (Harbin red sausage). Most shops open 9am-9pm. Bargaining possible in small shops but not in branded stores.

shopping.name: Harbin Souvenir Shop (尔滨之恋冰箱贴纪念品)
shopping.name_local: 尔滨之恋冰箱贴纪念品
shopping.notes_local: 专售哈尔滨主题冰箱贴、明信片和小礼品。适合购买平价纪念品。价格：每件10-50元。支持现金和微信支付。
shopping.notes_base: Specializes in Harbin-themed magnets, postcards, and small gifts. Good for affordable mementos. Price range: 10-50 RMB per item. Cash and WeChat Pay accepted.

shopping.name: Ancient Culture Street (古文化街)
shopping.location: Ancient Culture Street, Nankai District, Tianjin
shopping.location_base: Ancient Culture Street, Nankai District, Tianjin
shopping.location_local: Ancient Culture Street, Nankai District, Tianjin
shopping.notes_local: 联合国教科文组织认定的传统中国工艺品街。可购买：泥人张、剪纸、传统画作、中国结、古董。营业时间9:00-18:00。可砍价（从要价的50-60%开始）。注意避免高价'古董'——大多为仿制品。
shopping.notes_base: UNESCO-recognized street for traditional Chinese crafts. Shop for: Clay figurines (泥人张), paper cuts, traditional paintings, Chinese knots, vintage items. Open 9am-6pm. Bargaining expected (start at 50-60% of asking price). Avoid overpriced 'antiques' - most are reproductions.

shopping.name: Ancient Culture Market (古文化市场)
shopping.notes_local: 室内市场，多家摊贩售卖书法、印章、茶具和民间工艺品。比街面选择更集中。价格：每件20-500元。适合购买正宗本地工艺品。
shopping.notes_base: Indoor market with multiple vendors selling calligraphy, seals, tea sets, and folk art. More concentrated selection than the street. Prices: 20-500 RMB depending on item. Best for authentic local crafts.

shopping.name: Muslim Quarter (回民街)
shopping.notes_local: 著名美食街，有售兵马俑复制品、当地小吃、伊斯兰工艺品。可购买：迷你兵马俑（20-200元）、皮影、国画卷轴。营业至深夜（6:00-23:00）。游客较多——购买前检查品质。兵马俑仿品建议在正规商铺购买，勿从街头小贩处购买。
shopping.notes_base: Famous food street with shops selling terracotta warrior replicas, local snacks, Islamic crafts. Shop for: Mini terracotta warriors (20-200 RMB), shadow puppets, Chinese painting scrolls. Open late into evening (6am-11pm). Heavily touristy - check quality before buying. Terracotta replicas: buy from established shops, not street vendors.

shopping.name: Tang Dynasty Ever-Bright City (大唐不夜城)
shopping.location: South of Giant Wild Goose Pagoda, Xi'an
shopping.location_base: South of Giant Wild Goose Pagoda, Xi'an
shopping.location_local: South of Giant Wild Goose Pagoda, Xi'an
shopping.notes_local: 唐代主题现代文化综合体。可购买：唐风文创产品、丝巾、手工茶具、文化创意产品。营业时间10:00-22:00（夜市延至23:00）。品质和价格高于回民街。适合购买：送礼佳品、传统工艺现代诠释。
shopping.notes_base: Modern cultural complex with Tang Dynasty theme. Shop for: Tang-style cultural products, silk scarves, artisan tea sets, cultural creative products. Open 10am-10pm (night market extends to 11pm). Higher quality but also higher prices than Muslim Quarter. Good for: gift-worthy items, modern interpretations of traditional crafts.

shopping.name: Pingjiang Road Ancient Street (平江路古街)
shopping.notes_local: 运河边历史街区，有精品店铺。可购买：苏绣、丝绸制品、传统扇子、当地小吃。营业时间9:00-21:00。比山塘街游客少。丝绸制品：优质品100-500元。认准'苏州丝绸博物馆'认证标识以保证正品。
shopping.notes_base: Canal-side historic street with boutique shops. Shop for: Suzhou embroidery, silk products, traditional fans, local snacks. Open 9am-9pm. Less touristy than Shantang Street. Silk items: 100-500 RMB for quality pieces. Look for 'Suzhou Silk Museum' certification for authentic silk.

shopping.name: Suzhou Silk Museum Shop
shopping.notes_local: 博物馆官方商店，售卖认证正品苏州丝绸。可购买：丝巾（150-800元）、丝绸床品、传统刺绣。营业时间9:00-17:00（周一闭馆）。价格较高但品质和正品有保障。适合购买丝绸精品。游客可享免税购物。
shopping.notes_base: Official museum shop with certified authentic Suzhou silk products. Shop for: Silk scarves (150-800 RMB), silk bedding, traditional embroidery. Open 9am-5pm (closed Mondays). Higher prices but guaranteed quality and authenticity. Good for serious silk purchases. Tax-free shopping available for tourists.

shopping.name: Longjing Tea Village (龙井村)
shopping.location: Longjing Village, West Lake Scenic Area, Hangzhou
shopping.location_base: Longjing Village, West Lake Scenic Area, Hangzhou
shopping.location_local: Longjing Village, West Lake Scenic Area, Hangzhou
shopping.notes_local: 以正宗西湖龙井茶闻名。可购买：龙井绿茶（每500克200-2000元，视等级而定）。购买前可到家庭茶馆品茶。明前茶最贵品质最佳。避免路边小贩——请到有执照的正规茶馆购买。要求真空包装。中等品质约400-600元/500克。
shopping.notes_base: Famous for authentic West Lake Longjing tea. Shop for: Longjing green tea (200-2000 RMB/500g depending on grade). Visit family-run tea houses for tea tasting before buying. Spring harvest (pre-Qingming) is most expensive and best quality. Avoid street vendors - buy from established tea houses with licenses. Ask for vacuum-sealed packaging. Average good quality: 400-600 RMB/500g.

shopping.name: Hefang Street (河坊街)
shopping.notes_local: 西湖附近传统购物街。可购买：杭州丝绸制品、茶具、筷子、扇子、当地小吃（核桃糕、桂花糖）。营业时间9:00-22:00。游客店和本地店混合。也有龙井茶，但比茶村更商业化。小店可砍价。
shopping.notes_base: Traditional shopping street near West Lake. Shop for: Hangzhou silk products, tea sets, chopsticks, fans, local snacks (walnut cake, osmanthus candy). Open 9am-10pm. Mix of tourist shops and local businesses. Longjing tea also available but more touristy than village. Bargaining acceptable in small shops.

shopping.name: West Street (阳朔西街)
shopping.notes_local: 阳朔主要购物街。可购买：少数民族手工艺品、蜡染布、石雕、茶叶、当地小吃。营业时间9:00至深夜。游客很多——使劲砍价（从要价的40%起）。品质参差不齐。适合购买：休闲纪念品，非高价值商品。
shopping.notes_base: Main shopping street in Yangshuo. Shop for: Minority handicrafts, batik cloth, stone carvings, tea, local snacks. Open 9am-late. Very touristy - bargain hard (start at 40% of asking price). Quality varies greatly. Best for: casual souvenirs, not high-value items.

shopping.name: Guilin Specialty Shops (桂林特产伴手礼)
shopping.notes_local: 售卖桂林特产的连锁店。可购买：桂花糖、辣酱、桂林米粉酱、果脯、茶叶。明码标价（不砍价）。营业时间9:00-22:00。适合购买：包装礼品、食品。每件20-150元。真空包装适合旅行携带。
shopping.notes_base: Chain store selling Guilin specialties. Shop for: Osmanthus candy, chili sauce, Guilin rice noodle sauce, dried fruits, tea. Fixed prices (no bargaining). Open 9am-10pm. Good for: packaged gifts, food products. Price range: 20-150 RMB per item. Vacuum-packed for travel.

shopping.name: Zhangjiajie Specialty Stores
shopping.notes_local: 市中心多家特产店。可购买：土家织锦、张家界茶叶、腌制野菜、干蘑菇、蜂蜜。营业时间9:00-21:00。推荐店铺：湘品汇特产超市——明码标价、品质有保障。避免景区附近拉客商铺。每件30-200元。
shopping.notes_base: Multiple specialty stores in city center. Shop for: Tujia brocade (土家织锦), Zhangjiajie tea, preserved wild vegetables, dried mushrooms, local honey. Open 9am-9pm. Recommended stores: 湘品汇特产超市 (Xiangpinhui) - fixed prices, quality products. Avoid: shops with aggressive touts near tourist sites. Price range: 30-200 RMB per item.

shopping.name: Beijing Road Pedestrian Street (北京路步行街)
shopping.notes_local: 主要购物街，本地和国际品牌混合。可购买：广式草本产品、茶叶、干海鲜、时装。营业时间10:00-22:00。现代购物体验，有百货商场和精品店。适合主流购物，非传统工艺品。价格从平价到奢侈不等。
shopping.notes_base: Major shopping street with mix of local and international brands. Shop for: Cantonese herbal products, tea, dried seafood, fashion. Open 10am-10pm. Modern shopping experience with department stores and boutiques. Good for: mainstream shopping, not traditional crafts. Price range varies from budget to luxury.

shopping.name: Shamian Island Shops
shopping.notes_local: 殖民风格历史小岛，有精品店和咖啡馆。可购买：手工咖啡、小工艺品、明信片。氛围佳但购物种类有限。适合悠闲浏览，非大额购物。营业时间10:00-20:00。
shopping.notes_base: Historic colonial island with boutique shops and cafes. Shop for: Artisan coffee, small crafts, postcards. More atmosphere than shopping variety. Good for: leisurely browsing, not major purchases. Open 10am-8pm.

shopping.name: Dongmen Pedestrian Street (东门老街)
shopping.notes_local: 深受本地人欢迎的平价购物区。可购买：电子产品、时装、配饰。营业时间10:00-22:00。小店可砍价。比香港更实惠。注意辨别仿品——仔细检查品质。适合购买：平价时尚、电子配件。
shopping.notes_base: Budget shopping area popular with locals. Shop for: Electronics, fashion, accessories. Open 10am-10pm. Bargaining possible in small shops. More affordable than Hong Kong. Watch for knockoffs - check quality carefully. Good for: budget fashion finds, electronic accessories.

shopping.name: Temple Street Night Market (庙街夜市)
shopping.location: Temple Street, Yau Ma Tei, Kowloon, Hong Kong
shopping.location_base: Temple Street, Yau Ma Tei, Kowloon, Hong Kong
shopping.location_local: Temple Street, Yau Ma Tei, Kowloon, Hong Kong
shopping.notes_local: 著名夜市。可购买：纪念品、廉价电子产品、服装、玉石首饰。营业时间18:00至午夜。砍价文化浓厚（从要价的40%起）。注意假货。适合购买：香港纪念品、休闲纪念品。氛围本身就是体验的一部分。
shopping.notes_base: Famous night market. Shop for: Souvenirs, cheap electronics, clothing, jade jewelry. Opens 6pm-midnight. Heavy bargaining culture (start at 40% of asking price). Watch for fake goods. Good for: Hong Kong memorabilia, casual souvenirs. Atmosphere is part of the experience.

shopping.name: Harbour City
shopping.location: Canton Road, Tsim Sha Tsui, Hong Kong
shopping.location_base: Canton Road, Tsim Sha Tsui, Hong Kong
shopping.location_local: Canton Road, Tsim Sha Tsui, Hong Kong
shopping.notes_local: 香港最大的奢侈品购物中心之一。可购买：国际设计师品牌、手表、化妆品。营业时间10:00-22:00。明码标价（不砍价）。适合免税奢侈品购物和高端消费。相比大陆有税费优惠。
shopping.notes_base: One of Hong Kong's largest luxury malls. Shop for: International designer brands, watches, cosmetics. Open 10am-10pm. Fixed prices (no bargaining). Good for: duty-free luxury shopping, high-end purchases. Price range: luxury tier. Tax benefits compared to mainland China.

shopping.name: Senado Square (议事亭前地)
shopping.notes_local: 被商铺环绕的历史广场。可购买：葡式蛋挞、杏仁饼、葡萄牙酒、葡萄牙进口商品、澳门纪念品。知名饼家：钜记、安德鲁。营业时间10:00-22:00。正规商铺明码标价。适合购买：澳门食品伴手礼、葡式商品。蛋挞建议现买现吃（不宜长途携带）。
shopping.notes_base: Historic square surrounded by shops. Shop for: Portuguese egg tarts, almond cookies, Portuguese wine, Portuguese imported goods, Macau souvenirs. Famous bakeries: Koi Kei (钜记), Lord Stow's (安德鲁). Open 10am-10pm. Fixed prices in major stores. Good for: Macau food gifts, Portuguese products. Buy egg tarts fresh (don't transport long distances).

shopping.name: The Venetian Macao Shops
shopping.location: Estrada da Baia de Nossa Senhora da Esperanca, Macau
shopping.location_base: Estrada da Baia de Nossa Senhora da Esperanca, Macau
shopping.location_local: Estrada da Baia de Nossa Senhora da Esperanca, Macau
shopping.notes_local: 豪华度假村购物中心。可购买：国际品牌、珠宝、化妆品、葡萄牙酒。营业时间10:00-23:00。室内'威尼斯'运河主题。明码标价。适合奢侈品购物和浏览。比街边商铺档次更高。免税优势。
shopping.notes_base: Luxury resort shopping mall. Shop for: International brands, jewelry, cosmetics, Portuguese wine. Open 10am-11pm. Indoor 'Venice' canals theme. Fixed prices. Good for: luxury shopping, browsing. Higher-end than street shops. Duty-free advantages.

notes: Shopping budget recommendations are per location/area, not per item. Budget allocation: Days 1-10 (China domestic): focus on local specialties and crafts (30-80 USD/day). Days 11-13 (Guangzhou-Hong Kong-Macau): higher budget for luxury shopping if interested (100-200 USD/day). Currency: 1 USD = ~7.2 RMB. Payment: WeChat Pay/Alipay widely accepted in mainland China; cash/credit cards better in Hong Kong/Macau. Bargaining culture: Expected in markets and small shops (start 40-60% of asking price), not in malls or established stores. Quality check: For silk, tea, and jade, buy from established shops with certifications to avoid fakes. Luggage: Consider shipping purchases if buying heavy items (tea, ceramics) - many shops offer international shipping. Customs: Check airline baggage limits. No restrictions on tea, silk, or crafts for personal use. Avoid antiques (require special permits). Shopping timing: Don't schedule heavy shopping on travel days. Best shopping days: Days 3 (Tianjin), 6 (Suzhou silk), 7 (Hangzhou tea), 13 (Macau food gifts).
